title: Polder Styling Station (Teal Blue)
description: Get it together with this Polder Hanging Styling Station that holds your dryer and curling iron, or leave one compartment for all of your brushes and combs. You can easily hang it on a towel bar or towel hook, or store it in a drawer or cabinet in your bath. It's stainless steel mesh body and insulated silicone base allow you to store all of your hot tools immediately after use. ||Number of Pieces: 1 ||Used For: Hair Styling ||Hair Type: All Hair Types ||Features: Ergonomic Design ||Material: Metal, Plastic ||Power Source: Manual ||Care and Cleaning: Wipe Clean with a Damp Cloth ||Includes: Heat resistant pouch ||Battery: no battery used: ||Imported
